source.name: Training - Hawaii Briefing on Open Government
source.description: A recording of a one hour training session done for the State of Hawaii by Socrata.  It covers what Open Data is all about, how others have used Open data to improve the relationship of government to citizens.  It also explores the many features and uses of Open Data.
